section.title: isNotPresent
section.para: This rule attribute specifies that a string must not be present in the target text.
For example, the following is valid:
section.programlisting: <unit id="1"> <val:validation> <val:rule isNotPresent="store" /> </val:validation> <segment id="1"> <source>Choose an option in the online store.</source> <target>Escolha uma opção na loja online.</target> </segment> </unit>
